title: Ruth Ann Minner
added: Before her term was out on January 15, 2009, longtime senator [[Joe Biden]] had resigned after winning a seventh term to become [[Vice President of the United States| Vice President]]. Minner appointed Biden’s former chief of staff, [[Ted Kaufman]].

title: Ruth Ann Minner
added: Before her term was out on January 15, 2009, longtime senator [[Joe Biden]] had resigned after winning a seventh term to become [[Vice President of the United States| Vice President]]. Minner appointed Biden’s former chief of staff, [[Ted Kaufman]]to Biden’s Senate seat.
